archimate:Requirement.name: AS.1.1.13: The high-level working group or committee responsible for coordinating information security activity, should review the effectiveness of the security assurance programme on a regular basis, making adjustments when and where necessary.
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
